name: Voltbox
description: Voltbox is a retro-styled oscilloscope-themed robot, built with classic buttons and arms, and legs reminiscent of vintage gaming consoles. Its screen displays a striking red and black interface, invoking a sense of nostalgia. To add to its cool factor, Voltbox is equipped with sleek shades as an additional accessory. This unique robot is a proud member of the WebtrES club, bringing its oscillating abilities and vintage charm to the digital realm.
